notificationBody: It's time to record your daily weight in the app
name: Name
succesfullysaved: Your profile information has been succesfully saved!
selectGender: Select Gender and your dreamed body weight
mandatoryFields: Height and Target Weight are mandatory fields.
underweightDescription: You are considered underweight for your height.
healthy weightDescription: Congratulations! You are in the healthy weight range for your height.
overweightDescription: You are considered overweight for your height.
obesityDescription: You are in the obesity category.
underweightHealthEffects: Being underweight can lead to a weakened immune system, nutritional deficiencies, and an increased risk of infection.
healthy weightHealthEffects: Maintaining a healthy weight reduces the risk of chronic diseases and promotes overall well-being.
overweightHealthEffects: Being overweight increases the risk of heart disease, type 2 diabetes, and other health issues.
obesityHealthEffects: Obesity is associated with a higher risk of serious health conditions such as heart disease, stroke, and certain cancers.
underweightRecommendations: Consult a healthcare professional or nutritionist to develop a healthy weight gain plan.
healthy weightRecommendations: Continue to maintain a balanced diet and regular physical activity.
overweightRecommendations: Consult a healthcare professional or nutritionist to develop a weight management plan.
obesityRecommendations: Seek medical advice for comprehensive weight management and lifestyle changes.
bmiCategories: Weight ranges based on your height for BMI
weightValidationError: Invalid input. Please make sure you entered a plausible weight.
